overview: Chris manages all aspects of sales for Sococo and plays a critical role in expanding Sococoâ€™s global market and sales presence. Chris has a track record for building and leading successful sales organizations for telecommunications, cloud services, and enterprise computing companies. Previously, he held strategic executive roles architecting and managing enterprise sales organizations for cloud technology companies such as Cotendo, CDNetworks, Panther Express, and UltraDNS. In total he has successfully exited companies with a combined value of $700 million. Chris holds a B.S. in marketing and finance from California State University in Hayward.
